name: Bayview Hotel Georgetown Penang

reviews.text: We tried our chance at this hotel, after quite negative experience with one in the neighborhood. Fortunately they did have a room available.
reviews.title: A great deal

reviews.text: We got a room on the 10th floor, with a wonderful panorama.
reviews.title: Good value, family friendly hotel

likes.liked: — Excellent location and value for money.

reviews.title: not nice on the whole
reviews.text: The room and bathroom were spacious, well equipped, and clean.

description: An award winning hotel for business or leisure. Hotel accommodation, food & beverage services, meeting facilities, banquet function. BAYVIEW HOTEL GEORGETOWN PENANG actively pursues opportunities to provide customer with creative, flexible and value-added promotions which meet your evolving needs in today's travel budget.
